mapper.insert: INSERT INTO onClass(classNum, mento, onperiod) VALUES(#{classNum}, #{mento}, #{onperiod})

INSERT INTO offClass(classNum, location1, location2, startTime, endTime, offLimit, coach, startDate, endDate) VALUES(#{classNum}, #{location1}, #{location2}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{offLimit}, #{coach}, TO_DATE(#{startDate},'mm/dd/yyyy'), TO_DATE(#{endDate},'mm/dd/yyyy'))
mapper.select:

,mento, onPeriod FROM dietClass d JOIN onClass o ON d.classNum=o.classNum WHERE classType=0 ORDER BY classNum DESC
,location1, location2, startTime, endTime, offLimit, coach, TO_CHAR(startDate,'YYYYMMDD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate,'YYYYMMDD') endDate FROM dietClass d JOIN offClass o ON d.classNum=o.classNum WHERE classType=1 ORDER BY classNum DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cProgram(programNum, programName, programContent, saveFileName, originalFileName) VALUES(cprogram_seq.NEXTVAL, #{programName}, #{programContent}, #{saveFileName}, #{originalFileName})
mapper.select: SELECT programNum, programName, programContent, saveFileName, originalFileName FROM cProgram ORDER BY programNum
